title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and for Using AI
text: positron.tutorials collection tutorials working Positron. Covers scripts, Quarto documents, git, Github, Quarto websites. Makes extensive use tools tutorial.helpers package.

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and for Using AI
text: install package CRAN: However, CRAN package include data necessary running tutorials. best solution install development version GitHub : However, want use CRAN version, , first load library, prompted run setup_tutorial_data() Console order download necessary data.

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and for Using AI
text: many tutorials package. run tutorial, use learnr::run_tutorial(), providing short name tutorial package name.

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and for Using AI
text: core tutorials introduce students Positron integrated development environment. Positron Code (“01-code”). Introduce students Positron writing R code simple scripts. Positron Quarto (“02-quarto”). Demonstrate tricks working R code using Positron, also explain Quarto documents. Terminal (“03-terminal”). Teach command line. Positron GitHub Introduction (“04-github-1”). Explain basics Git GitHub, mostly context Positron. Positron GitHub Advanced (“05-github-2”). Provide practice working Git/GitHub, including details use GitHub Pages. Quarto Websites Introduction (“06-websites-1”). Demonstrate basics website construction using Quarto projects. Quarto Websites Advanced (“07-websites-2”). Practice Quarto websites, focus splitting data analysis tasks separate files.

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and for Using AI
text: tutorials cover material R Data Science (2e) (R4DS) Hadley Wickham, Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel, Garrett Grolemund. five related tutorials package: r4ds-1, r4ds-2, r4ds-3, r4ds-4, r4ds-5. Different tutorials cover different chapters book follows.

title: Positron Tutorials — positron.tutorials-package
text: positron.tutorials package provides interactive tutorials three main categories: Positron modern development tools, R Data Science fundamentals, US Census data analysis. R Data Science tutorials based R Data Science (2e) Hadley Wickham, Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel, Garrett Grolemund. Census tutorial draws Analyzing US Census Data: Methods, Maps, Models R Kyle Walker.

title: Positron Tutorials — positron.tutorials-package
text: comprehensive collection interactive tutorials covering Positron modern development workflows, R Data Science essentials, US Census data analysis. package makes extensive use tools tutorial.helpers package.

title: Positron Tutorials — positron.tutorials-package
text: package includes seven tutorials focused Positron modern R development: Positron Code (01-code): Introduction Positron writing R code simple scripts Positron Quarto (02-quarto): Advanced R coding tricks Positron Quarto document creation Terminal (03-terminal): Command line fundamentals Positron GitHub Introduction (04-github-1): Git GitHub basics within Positron Positron GitHub Advanced (05-github-2): Advanced Git/GitHub workflows GitHub Pages Quarto Websites Introduction (06-websites-1): Basic website construction using Quarto projects Quarto Websites Advanced (07-websites-2): Advanced Quarto websites modular data analysis

title: Positron Tutorials — positron.tutorials-package
text: package includes five r4ds tutorials (r4ds-1 r4ds-5) cover: Data import visualization Data transformations tidying Working databases, strings, regular expressions Factors, dates, times, joins Web scraping, functions, iterations

title: Positron Tutorials — positron.tutorials-package
text: tidycensus-1 tutorial covers working US Census data using tidycensus package.

title: Positron Tutorials — positron.tutorials-package
text: run tutorial, use: learnr::run_tutorial(name = "short_tutorial_name", package = "positron.tutorials") Available tutorial names include: 01-code, 02-quarto, 03-terminal, 04-github-1, 05-github-2, 06-websites-1, 07-websites-2, r4ds-1, r4ds-2, r4ds-3, r4ds-4, r4ds-5, tidycensus-1.
